attributes.action: Have a referendum on Great Britain becoming the 51 state of America .
attributes.additional_details: For the safety and the well-being of its people.
attributes.background: Have a referendum on Great Britain becoming the 51 state of USA,as our own government has shown it can’t run the country and look after its people. The USA since leaving Britain has shown it can do a better job.Old wise British saying states when Britain is in danger it must look to the sea, USA

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not directly responsible for.

Joining of the United States of America would be a matter for the US Congress to decide, and not something the UK Government or Parliament could unilaterally do.
